chunk: Ingredients: HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) HYBRID OIL*, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL*, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE (FROM COCONUT OIL), SQUALANE (FROM OLIVE OIL), SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL*, ALARIA ESCULENTA (ATLANTIC SEAWEED) EXTRACT, HUMULUS LUPULUS (HOPS) STROBILE, AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL OIL, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E).

chunk: Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
